# Architecture Overview
Hybrid 5-layer mesh combining centralized rendering with planetary edge caching.

![Layers](https://i.imgur.com/8example.png) <!-- replace with real diagram later -->

- Layer 0: xAI Central Rendering + DHT Index  
- Layer 1: Regional ISP Super Hubs  
- Layer 2: City-level Router & Phone Clusters  
- Layer 3: WebRTC Local Sub-Mesh  
- Layer 4: Client Playback (E2EE)

See full diagrams in the [Whitepaper PDF â†’](https://github.com/analystcode/AFASTGRok-MESH-/raw/main/FASTGRok_MESH_Whitepaper_v1.1.pdf)
